meanings.sent1: The garbage can was the smelliest thing in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The skunk was the smelliest animal in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The smelliest socks in the house could walk on their own!
meanings.sent4: The smelliest cheese in the fridge could wake up the neighbors.
meanings.sent5: The smelliest perfume in the store made everyone run away.

meanings.sent1: The flower was the smelliest in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The garbage bin was the smelliest object in the room.
meanings.sent3: The smelliest dog in the park loved rolling in mud.
meanings.sent4: The smelliest smoke in the air made everyone cough.
meanings.sent5: The smelliest food in the cafeteria cleared the room in seconds.
